text: Yokogawa 1-chome is a Hiroden station on the Hiroden Yokogawa Line, located in Yokogawa-cho, Nishi-ku, Hiroshima. It is operated by the Hiroshima Electric Railway. ==Routes== There are two routes that serve Yokogawa 1-chome Station: * Yokogawa Station - Hiroden-honsha-mae Route * Yokogawa Station - Eba Route ==Station layout== The station consists of two side platforms serving two tracks. Access to the platforms is via a crosswalk. ==Adjacent stations== ==Surrounding area== *Hiroshima City Nishi Ward Library ==History== *Opened as "Koryuji-mae" on November 1, 1917. *Renamed to "Yokogawa 1-chome" in 1938. ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes ==External links== Yokogawa 1-chome Station Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1917
